about.title: About Me
about.p1: I am a software developer with a deep passion for technology, currently in my third year of the Computer Science Degree Course at the University of Camerino. My goal is to create software that not only works flawlessly but is also intuitive, accessible, and capable of solving real-world problems, from backend to frontend.
about.p2: I approach every project with curiosity and a problem-solving mindset. I strongly believe in collaboration and the value of the open-source community, where I actively contribute to continuously learn and improve my skills.

experiences.description: Developing custom software solutions for private clients and small businesses, managing the entire project lifecycle: from requirements gathering and design to development, testing, and final deployment.

Actively contributed to analyzing and resolving bugs in existing applications, improving software stability. I also collaborated on developing new features, applying testing and debugging methodologies in a professional environment.
First experience in a corporate setting, where I supported the development team with programming tasks and learned team dynamics and industry best practices under the guidance of senior developers.
